description: Unique identifier for this maintenance scheduling exception record.
Identifier of the scheduled maintenance entry for a specific asset and procedure that this exception applies to; likely a foreign key; confirm with SME.
Calendar due date for the maintenance task associated with the exception, possibly adjusted from the original schedule.
Meter reading at which the task is due according to the schedule (e.g., miles, hours).
Code indicating the scheduling basis or exception type (e.g., calendar-based vs meter-based); confirm with SME.
Free-text notes describing the reason or context for the exception.
User account associated with this record (owning or legacy field); likely redundant with created/modified users; confirm with SME.
System-generated timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
Identifier for the meter type used for the due value (e.g., miles, kilometers, engine hours).
Timestamp captured by user audit for the last modification of this record.
User account that created the record.
Date and time the record was created.
User account that last modified the record.
Date and time the record was last modified.
